text: 168 (one hundred sixty-eight) is a natural number. It comes after 167 and before 169. == In mathematics == *Even number: 168 is even, so it can be divided by 2. *Divisors: It has several divisors, including 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 12, 14, 21, 24, 28, 42, 56, 84, and 168. *Prime factorization: 168=2^3×3×7 *Hours in a week: There are 168 hours in one week (24 hours × 7 days). *Group theory: In higher mathematics, 168 is the number of elements (order) in a special group called PSL(2, 7). Category:Integers
title: 168 (number)
